title: Big Bend National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Relocating a Black Bear Cub NPS Photo/Rick Roberts   Â    The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events and special and re-occurring events which occur within and around the units of the Park Service. Big Bend National Park publishes the Paisano, the official visitor guide which provides visit planning information and contains articles on various resource-related topics. Big Bend also provides news releases to local and regional newspapers; current and past news releases that can also be found here on the park web site. For all press inquiries, call the park's Public Information Officer at 432-477-1108 or by email.
